column1: All Figured Out,Finally Famous in this.[
column2: ]It's crazy how they think you got it all figured out[
column3: ]Just because your bank account gets all figured out[
column4: ]Next time somebody try and tell you how to run your shit[
column5: ]And they ain't major shit[
column6: ]Do yourself a favor: kick 'em out.[
column7: ]Eat good and do that, you'll live a long life[
column8: ]I always say long days is better than long nights[
column9: ]At least in the day you've got shade[
column10: ]In the night its all shadows, don't get caught at wrong lights[
column11: ]I wish somebody would have told B.I.G. that before March ninth[
column12: ]I used to think there's no such things as wrong rights[
column13: ]'Till my stepbrother brought home them extra groceries[
column14: ]Extra cheese, now mom could make her special recipe[

column17: ]I guess that's the hunger that got me out[
column18: ]At the top of hotel suites renting the lobbys out, you know?[
column19: ]Stuntin' like a bitch, prom night me out[
column20: ]And the girl I've wanted since ninth grade trying to route[
column21: ]That was back when I was seventeen[
column22: ]It's crazy though, cause even then I thought I had it all figured out[
column23: ]It's crazy how much that you can see with your eyes closed[
column24: ]'Specially if you've got a vision[
column25: ]Or how you could have everything[
column26: ]And still think about everything missing[
column27: ]Like I probably remember the times I missed out on[
column28: ]More than the ones I lived[
column29: ]I probably remember the girls that I ain't have[
column30: ]More than the ones I did[
column31: ]But I remain a two timing, one girl on the way[
column32: ]Two lyin and one bed-never too tired[
column33: ]Smoke so much I need two lighters[
column34: ]Shoppin oas I do buy it, who higher?[
column35: ]They taught me that I had to dream, black history month[
column36: ]I wake up and treat the day like stack history month[
column37: ]I'm talkin' Malcolm Flex, Jessie Rackson[
column38: ]Front of the plane: I'm Rozay Parks[
column39: ]SUV swervin like it's O.J.'s car, oh[
column40: ]To me and my dogs is all gettin out[
column41: ]Somewhere in the club probably all liquored out[
column42: ]Finna take extra shots for my dogs missin' out[
column43: ]That keep remindin' me at the same time[
column44: ]That I still ain't got it all figured out[
column45: ]Fact, the only thing I really figured out[
column46: ]Is that I'll never have it all figured out, fuck.[
column47: ]Even when your bank account is all figured out[
column48: ]Even when your bank account gets all figured out[
column49: ]Even when your best friend gets all trickered out[
column50: ]Even when it. all of it... when you still ain't got...[
column51: ]Today I woke up and realized every day gets shorter[
column52: ]Every minute turns into the longest second, yet never ending[
column53: ]Age is nothing but a reminder and it doesn't tell you[
column54: ]How old or young minded someone is[
column55: ]Cause we all started at the same starting point of a woman's legs[
column56: ]But each have our own finish line[
column57: ]Understand it never ends, and the only way to be immortalized[
column58: ]Is to be remembered, hopefully from right than wrong[
column59: ]Better to be in the hall of fame than shame[
column60: ]Whether it exists for what you do or not[
column61: ]We create this world so we make what exists[
column62: ]It isn't about the award, it's about the award of being immortalized[
column63: ]And remembered for all the right reasons[
column64: ]Mistakes are forgotten, no footprints of any missteps[
column65: ]So when it's so late that it's early[
column66: ]And you need a drink even though the bar's closed[
column67: ]Remember why you do what you do[
column68: ]For the coldest drinks, the fastest cars, luxury[
column69: ]The adrenaline rush of creating what you think about[
column70: ]With who thinks about you:[
column71: ]Your family, your team[
column72: ]The joy of looking back and saying that you did it[
column73: ]Winning the game: hall of fame

column1: No More Interviews,I guess I'm on my... on my Don shit[
column2: ]Somebody gotta do it[
column3: ]Look, no more interviews[
column4: ]I'm not talking about this on a song, feature or interlude[
column5: ]Reporting live from Hawaii with my girl[
column6: ]I brought sand to the beach[
column7: ]Working on vacay in the booth, sand on my feet[
column8: ]I'm from the ground up like a ground-ball play[
column9: ]I'm coming from the underground like it's Groundhog's Day[
column10: ]I'm talking so underground that when I talk about J, nigga[
column11: ]I might mean J Dilla, R.I.P. real niggas[
column12: ]Lately I only do the shit that inspire me[
column13: ]Lately niggas treat the Shade Room like a diary[
column14: ]Oh yeah, is that what you heard?[
column15: ]Believing everything that you hear without confirming it first[
column16: ]And you know the funny thing about it is my ex wanna write a tell all[
column17: ]Fucked up thing about it is she ain't even tell all[
column18: ]Like how I introduced her to meditation, positive thinking[
column19: ]And the books she probably read in daily rotation[
column20: ]I learned when people lie on you not to return the favor so[
column21: ]I won't get you embarrassed[
column22: ]I won't tell them all the other parts about you that's plastic[
column23: ]This my last time putting my ex in a song even though the last one went triple platinum[
column24: ]I'd rather put that energy into what's worth having[
column25: ]Like how I got a platinum album with no solo tour[
column26: ]Niggas say it's over for me I go overboard[
column27: ]Back against the wall like my poster but I'm the poster boy[
column28: ]Not from the city if you let THEY tell it[
column29: ]Greatest rapper of all time if you let YE tell it[
column30: ]You ask me, I don't got the resume[
column31: ]But, shit, I can go bar for bar for niggas who talking off[
column32: ]And getting egged on by A&Rs; who, soon as your shit fallin' off, they walkin' off[
column33: ]And if you rappers diss us and ours just know that you dead and you know it[
column34: ]My career been moving perpetual motion[
column35: ]I'm not impressed with the whoopty woop, I don't know who is who[
column36: ]And can't pretend like I'm hip to it, no hula hoop[
column37: ]And I can't lie like I like this shit like I usually do[
column38: ]And I'm just not impressed by you niggas rapping fast[
column39: ]Who sound like one big asthma attack but trash when I'm rapping it back[
column40: ]Who you put in your top five and claim they the savior of rap[
column41: ]So many friends turn to enemies, they frenemies[
column42: ]I don't know why I act like I'm surprised or it's offending me[
column43: ]I'm saying, though, I should have learned from Hov and Dame[
column44: ]From Stunna and Wayne, Cudi and YE[
column45: ]What happened to our family ways, though?[
column46: ]When I put you on that song with Nas, you had told me that you was forever grateful[
column47: ]And that we brothers, so it hurt to hit the internet to find out that me and you don't fuck with each other[
column48: ]Over a miscommunication that probably could be fixed with a 5 minute conversation, I'm still praying[
column49: ]For ya, though, I guess I charged it to the game[
column50: ]How much it cost? Around twenty88[
column51: ]Going off like Kobe when he wore the crazy eights[
column52: ]All y'all niggas looking like my kiddos wearing Bape[
column53: ]Shot my first video in the Harajuku store[
column54: ]With Nigo in the background, that's a picture that you can't take[
column55: ]With YE and Hype Williams directing each take[
column56: ]And GOD directing each step that we take[
column57: ]I'm a king, a legend, man, you niggas ain't worthy[
column58: ]10 years in and a nigga still under 30[
column59: ]I'm feeling like an old man that failed at life[
column60: ]Got reincarnated to do it all again right (that's how I feel)[
column61: ]So I'm treating every second like it's an investment[
column62: ]Time is money, every second I'm collecting[
column63: ]Don't ask me no stupid questions[
column64: ]"Are you still signed to YE?" questions, no Roc nation questions[
column65: ]Or who I'm dating questions, look, no more interviews[
column66: ]Unless you wanna talk about the music or something that has a different view[
column67: ]And not the shit that's getting the hits and views[
column68: ]Words misconstrued with no credit, but you niggas approved[
column69: ]My mistakes are my biggest professors and learning life lessons[
column70: ]I realize it ain't what you have, it's what you feel, that's what true success is[
column71: ]I am the one of one, after me there's no successor[
column72: ]DON

column1: Nothing Is Stopping You,I know I'mma get it, I just don't know how[
column2: ]Heart up on the stage, body in the crowd[
column3: ]Parents always tried keep me home[
column4: ]But I can't get paid from the crib, so I'll be gone till we on[
column5: ]Whats up, Finally Famous[
column6: ]I had it on my jacket way back in high school[
column7: ]Know I wanted to be in them night clubs and not all off in that night school[
column8: ]So me and my niggas real life'd it, every week we did them cyphers[
column9: ]At the radio, had a crazy flow, man the city ain't heard shit like this,[
column10: ]I woke up early on a saturday[
column11: ]Said I'mma cash my check and hit some ass today[
column12: ]Hit the bank, my nigga called me like: "Go rap for Ye[
column13: ]He at the station, rap that shit that you rap everyday"[
column14: ]Man, that shit sounds stupid then I hang up on his ass[
column15: ]Then called him back like "Fuck, let's do it"[
column16: ]I didn't even cash my check, man can't believe my ass pursued it[
column17: ]I didn't even have no gas but somehow God just lead me to it[
column18: ]Like, "Let's do it"[
column19: ]When I heard the songs he was doing[
column20: ]Man, I knew he had to be on G.O.O.D Music[
column21: ](BIG! SEAN!)[
column22: ]Just to think, last night I was in Venice hugging bitches,[
column23: ]Thanking God Almighty, condoms were invented[
column24: ]Cause I had a yellow bone[
column25: ]That could've come from out the Simpsons man[
column26: ]Who claim she never did it (Yeah right)[
column27: ]But under these conditions she was with it[
column28: ]Then I hopped up on that red eye when I finished[
column29: ]I been gone for five hours, fuck, my head still spinning[
column30: ]Fucked the hotel up, shit she probably still in it,[
column31: ]Getting rest that I be missing, but fuck it I'm on a mission[
column32: ]Flight delayed like 30 minutes, now that's the shit that I hate[
column33: ]Now it's eight thirty, I'm officially late, for that eight o'clock spot[
column34: ]I know the Program Director hot, but I spit a freestyle up in there so cold[
column35: ]That everybody in that bitch forgot, now I'm running late for sound check[
column36: ]And I heard the line's already to the lot, walking out the station[
column37: ]And that's around the time that I got stopped, by this shorty tryna rhyme[
column38: ]Manager said we ain't got time, But time to time[
column39: ]You gotta make time when it's time for karma to come back around[
